>

</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Oil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=663" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 257 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 330 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You can rub this bronze-colored oil onto a melee weapon to grant it the benefits of the [animated](/Equipment.aspx?ID=293) rune. Once you fail a flat check for the weapon, causing it to fall, this effect ends.

</column>
